long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elite Cuisine Elite Gourmet ETO Double French Door Countertop Convection Toaster Oven, Bake Broil Toast Rotisserie, 23L capacity fits a 12″ pizza, 6-Slice, Black, ERO-2008S

It is an incredible expansion to any kitchen. It can cook, heat, toast, keep warm, and has a rotisserie work. There is even an oven-top nonstick flame broil, iron, and liner with a high-top arch cover to utilize while cooking in the oven.

Its enormous limit prepares dinners large enough for the entire family and can even heat up to a 12″ pizza. With these numerous capacities in a toaster oven, it was worked to make cooking in the kitchen simple and advantageous.

It has an additional huge inside limit that is ideal for your huge occasion, social affairs, or neighborhood parties. Reliable warming force makes this Countertop Toaster Oven Broiler a definitive force to be reckoned with!
